title: If You See This "Super Cute" Avocado Mug at HomeGoods, Grab 2
description: This adorable find will brighten up your morning coffee routine. READ MORE...
author: Ashia Aubourg
excerpt: This adorable find will brighten up your morning coffee routine.

All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: Chiociolla/ShutterstockThe idea of a dopamine menu has been trending on social media. The trend involves compiling a list of things that bring you joy and improve your mindset. One thing that’s been popping up on people’s carefully curated indexes? Cute yet affordable kitchen upgrades. Recently, HomeGoods stocked its shelves with the most adorable avocado-shaped mugs, and while they may appear simple, they’ve added an ounce of delight to people’s days. The popular mugs are shaped like avocados, with the luscious green center and brown pit showing as if the fruit was cut open. They come with a lid so that you can steep your honey chamomile latte or aromatic ginger tea. While the cute cup isn’t sold online, you can head to your nearest HomeGoods location to scour the shelves and try to find one. Shoppers cannot wait to add these cute mugs to their collection. One person commented on the post detailing the find, saying, “I could easily have hundreds of mugs. That avocado one is super cute.” Another user called out, “I think the avocado [mug] is my favorite.”If you prefer to find a dupe online, Amazon sells a similar nine-ounce version. It comes with the popular lid so that you can steep your favorite teas, too.  Still, you’ll likely find a better deal at HomeGoods, where the average price of mugs ranges from $5 to $7 each. So, if you’ve been eyeing this adorable cup, head to your nearest location to try to pick up one (or three!). Buy: Avocado Mug with Lid, $15
html:
• Tools & Equipment
  • Product Reviews & Recommendations

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

The idea of a dopamine menu has been trending on social media. The trend involves compiling a list of things that bring you joy and improve your mindset. One thing that’s been popping up on people’s carefully curated indexes? Cute yet affordable kitchen upgrades. 

Recently, HomeGoods stocked its shelves with the most adorable avocado-shaped mugs, and while they may appear simple, they’ve added an ounce of delight to people’s days. 

The popular mugs are shaped like avocados, with the luscious green center and brown pit showing as if the fruit was cut open. They come with a lid so that you can steep your honey chamomile latte or aromatic ginger tea. While the cute cup isn’t sold online, you can head to your nearest HomeGoods location to scour the shelves and try to find one. 

Shoppers cannot wait to add these cute mugs to their collection. One person commented on the post detailing the find, saying, “I could easily have hundreds of mugs. That avocado one is super cute.” Another user called out, “I think the avocado [mug] is my favorite.”

If you prefer to find a dupe online, Amazon sells a similar nine-ounce version. It comes with the popular lid so that you can steep your favorite teas, too.  

Still, you’ll likely find a better deal at HomeGoods, where the average price of mugs ranges from $5 to $7 each. So, if you’ve been eyeing this adorable cup, head to your nearest location to try to pick up one (or three!). 

Buy: Avocado Mug with Lid, $15
